## Fotos

```{=html}

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <style>
        .carousel {
            width: 100%;
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .carousel img {
            width: 100%;
            transition: transform 0.5s ease;
        }

        .btn {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            cursor: pointer;
            padding: 10px;
            z-index: 100;
        }

        .prev {
            left: 10px;
        }

        .next {
            right: 10px;
        }

        .dot-container {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 10px;
            background: rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
        }

        .dot {
            cursor: pointer;
            height: 15px;
            width: 15px;
            margin: 0 2px;
            background-color: #bbb;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: inline-block;
            transition: background-color 0.6s ease;
        }

        .active, .dot:hover {
            background-color: #717171;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

<div class="carousel" id="carousel">
    <button class="btn prev" onclick="moveSlide(-1)">&#10094;</button>
    <img src="imagens/ap.png" alt="Image 1">
    <img src="imagens/ap2.png" alt="Image 2">
    <img src="imagens/ap3.png" alt="Image 3">
    <!-- Adicione mais imagens conforme necessário -->
    <button class="btn next" onclick="moveSlide(1)">&#10095;</button>
</div>

<div class="dot-container">
    <span class="dot" onclick="currentSlide(0)"></span>
    <span class="dot" onclick="currentSlide(1)"></span>
    <span class="dot" onclick="currentSlide(2)"></span>
    <!-- Adicione mais pontos conforme necessário -->
</div>

<script>
    var slideIndex = 0;
    showSlides(slideIndex);

    function moveSlide(n) {
        showSlides(slideIndex += n);
    }

    function currentSlide(n) {
        showSlides(slideIndex = n);
    }

    function showSlides(n) {
        var i;
        var slides = document.querySelectorAll('.carousel img');
        var dots = document.getElementsByClassName("dot");
        if (n >= slides.length) {slideIndex = 0}
        if (n < 0) {slideIndex = slides.length - 1}
        for (i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
            slides[i].style.transform = "translateX(-" + slideIndex * 100 + "%)";
        }
        for (i = 0; i < dots.length; i++) {
            dots[i].className = dots[i].className.replace(" active", "");
        }
        dots[slideIndex].className += " active";
    }
</script>

</body>
</html>
```
```{r include=FALSE}
# Instalar e carregar as bibliotecas necessárias
if (!require("leaflet")) install.packages("leaflet")
library(leaflet)

if (!require("magrittr")) install.packages("magrittr")
library(magrittr)

# Definir as coordenadas
ponto_central <- c(27.22, 138.26)
escola1 <- c(-24.38, 1.45)
escola2 <- c(-30.43, -112.73)

# Criar o mapa
mapa <- leaflet() %>%
        addTiles() %>%  # Adiciona o mapa base
        addMarkers(lng = ponto_central[2], lat = ponto_central[1], popup = "Ponto Central") %>%
        addMarkers(lng = escola1[2], lat = escola1[1], popup = "Escola 1") %>%
        addMarkers(lng = escola2[2], lat = escola2[1], popup = "Escola 2") %>%
        addCircles(lng = ponto_central[2], lat = ponto_central[1], radius = 2000, color = "red", fillColor = "red", fillOpacity = 0.5) %>%
        addCircles(lng = escola1[2], lat = escola1[1], radius = 2000, color = "blue", fillColor = "blue", fillOpacity = 0.5) %>%
        addCircles(lng = escola2[2], lat = escola2[1], radius = 2000, color = "green", fillColor = "green", fillOpacity = 0.5)


```

```{=html}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="pt">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Variação de Aluguel - Saguaçu, Joinville</title>
    <style>
        .price-range-container {
            width: 100%;
            margin: 20px auto;
        }

        .price-range-bar {
            position: relative;
            height: 20px;
            background-color: #ddd;
            border-radius: 10px;
        }

        .indicator {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .average-price-indicator {
            background-color: blue;
            left: 50%;
        }

        .offered-price-indicator {
            background-color: green;
            left: calc(42% - 10px);
        }

        .tooltip {
            visibility: hidden;
            width: 200px;
            background-color: black;
            color: #fff;
            text-align: center;
            border-radius: 6px;
            padding: 5px 0;
            position: absolute;
            z-index: 1;
            bottom: 30px;
            left: 50%;
            margin-left: -100px;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s;
        }

        .tooltip::after {
            content: "";
            position: absolute;
            top: 100%;
            left: 50%;
            margin-left: -5px;
            border-width: 5px;
            border-style: solid;
            border-color: black transparent transparent transparent;
        }

        .indicator:hover .tooltip {
            visibility: visible;
            opacity: 1;
        }

        .price-labels {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            margin-top: 5px;
        }

        .legend {
            margin-top: 10px;
            font-size: 0.9em;

</head>
```

Alerta

```{=html}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="pt">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Alerta de Imóvel</title>
    <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/5.15.1/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        .alert {
            display: none; /* Inicialmente oculto */
            padding: 10px 20px;
            background-color: #ffeb3b; /* Cor de fundo amarela */
            color: black; /* Cor do texto preto */
            text-align: center; /* Alinhamento do texto */
            margin: 0; /* Sem margens */
            width: 100%; /* Largura total */
        }

        .alert i {
            font-size: 20px; /* Tamanho normal do ícone */
            vertical-align: middle; /* Alinhamento vertical com o texto */
            margin-right: 10px;
        }

        .alert strong {
            font-size: 14px; /* Tamanho menor do texto */
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="alert" id="alertBox">
        <i class="fas fa-exclamation-circle"></i>
        <strong>Imóvel situado em uma região de alta procura.</strong>
    </div>

    <script>
        window.onload = function() {
            var delay = Math.random() * (9000 - 1000) + 1000; // Tempo aleatório entre 9000ms (9s) e 15000ms (15s)
            setTimeout(function() {
                document.getElementById('alertBox').style.display = 'block';
            }, delay);
        };
    </script>
</body>
</html>
```

```{=html}
            animation-iteration-count: infinite;
        }

            0% { transform: translateX(0); }
            25% { transform: translateX(-5px); }
            50% { transform: translateX(5px); }
            75% { transform: translateX(-5px); }
            100% { transform: translateX(0); }
        }
    </style>
</head>

        setInterval(() => {
```
